特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Seminar. Students in this class will read the assigned book chapter every week and watch the corresponding video lectures which includes questions and assignments on the content of each class. Students will also discuss real ethical questions in class and an online forum using the different approaches that are introduced in the book to further strengthen the understanding of different moral principles.

第2回: Welfare, freedom, and virtue as three approaches to justice.

Reading of assigned book chapter and preparation for class discussion.
第5回: Markets and Morals - two examples: drafting soldies or hiring them, pregnancy for pay.
Reading of assigned book chapter and preparation for class discussion.
第6回: Immanuel Kant - What matters is the motive.
Reading of assigned book chapter and preparation for class discussion.
第7回: John Rawls - The case for equality.
Reading of assigned book chapter and preparation for class discussion.
第8回: Reading of assigned book chapter and preparation for class discussion.
第9回: Reading of assigned book chapter and preparation for class discussion.

Reading of assigned book chapter and preparation for class discussion.
第11回: Reading of assigned book chapter and preparation for class discussion.
